page.title: 19BRILL FAIRS AND STEAM RALLY.
page.content: Annual fairs have been held in Brill for many years.Nowadays there are fairs held on The Green in September and October.The steam rally is held mostly on the first weekend in September.It is held at Temple Farm, Brill in order to raise money for charity.There are steam engines,steam rollers,steam tractors and showmen's engines.The steam engines come from as far away as 100 miles sometimes.The first rally was held in 1974.That was a 1 day rally.Since then there has been a 2 day rally.Up to 25 engines come every year.The 1985 fair is to celebrate the tercentenary of the windmill.The aim of the faire is to recreate a fair of the 1680's.There will be craft stalls, morris dancing,plays and maypole dancing.Everybody who takes part will be dressing up in 17th.c.clothes.It will be held round the windmill.
